page.title: 14Park Homes on Horse-Eye
page.content: Each Park Home at Lion House Park, Hailsham - formerly a caravan park is attractively sited in its own garden. This form of housing is factory built on small wheels and transported to the site by low loader lorry, often in two halves which are bolted together when they arrive. They resemble small bungalows when sited and connected to mains gas, water, electricity and drainage services. Each has a garden shed supplied. A 42ft x 20ft Twin Unit - one that comes in two halves - consisting of a large lounge, dining room, fitted kitchen, 2 bedrooms, toilet, bathroom & utility room, completely furnished & carpeted throughout costs Â£38,000. Ground Rent was Â£51 a month in 1985. Single units 44ft x 12ft with similar amenities are also sited there.
